oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Traditional fishing in Tunisia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color, 30 min. Arabic sound track. Made by the Tunisian anthropologist and filmmaker, Sophie Ferchiou, the focus is on material culture. Different kinds of fishing on the southern coast of Tunisia are depicted. Information on social relations is lacking. There is an argument for continuity from Roman times (as seen in mosaics).
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ferchiou, Sophie
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Ethnographic and Anthropological Films - Egypt and Beyond
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is under original copyright.
